Memory management

Influence how Addressable assets and AssetBundles impact memory, and prevent memory leaks, and memory overhead through asset duplication.

Topic Description
Managing asset memory Understand how the Addressables system manages the memory of assets.
Addressable AssetBundle memory considerations Organize AssetBundles to minimize memory impact.
